sentence: Speakers at the rally include North Carolina Representatives Madison Cawthorn, Dan Bishop and Greg Murphy.

sentence: Another Trump loyalist, North Carolina Representative Madison Cawthorn, is similarly facing a legal challenge from voters to his reelection.
author: Jon Jackson
title: Donald Trump Could Lose One of His Most Loyal Supporters in Congress
